Name: Steel Plates Faults
Summary: A dataset of steel plates faults, classified into 7 different types. The goal was to train machine learning for automatic pattern recognition.

Sections.Title: Dataset Information
Sections.Content: The dataset consists of 1941 instances with 27 features representing characteristics of steel plates. The faults are classified into seven types: Pastry, Z_Scratch, K_Scratch, Stains, Dirtiness, Bumps, and Other_Faults.
